title: Why Control of Kherson Is Important to Russia and Ukraine
description: Russian occupation officials may be reducing their presence in the southern city, but Ukraine says Moscow will still fight to retain it.
dc:creator: Matthew Mpoke Bigg and Marc Santora
media:credit: Ivor Prickett for The New York Times
